panels.description: Overall request rate per second across all selected endpoints
panels.title: Total Request Rate [5m]

panels.description: Request rate per second grouped by HTTP status code

targets.expr: sum by (status) (rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m]))

panels.title: Request Rate by Status Code [5m]

panels.description: Top 10 routes by request rate with status breakdown

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by(method, route) (rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m])))

panels.title: Top Routes by Request Rate [5m]

targets.expr: sum by(route, method) (rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{status=~"4.*", route=~"$route", method=~"$method", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m]))

panels.title: 4xx Response Rate per Method and Route [5m]

targets.expr: sum by(route, method) (rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{status=~"5.*", route=~"$route", method=~"$method", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m]))

panels.title: 5xx Response Rate per Method and Route [5m]

panels.description: Average request time duration in a 5 min interval. Filtered by route, method, status and instance.
panels.title: Request Duration P99 by Route [5m]

panels.description: Average rate request per second in a 5 min interval aggregate by instance. Filtered by route, method, status.

targets.expr: avg(rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m])) by (route, method, status)

panels.title: Request Rate [5m]

panels.description: Average request time duration in a 5 min interval aggregate by instances. Filtered by route, method, status.

targets.expr: 1000 * avg((rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_sum{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m]) / rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"}[5m]))) by (route, method, status)

panels.title: Avg Request Duration [5m]

panels.description: Total number of requests filtered by route, method, status and instance.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Total average time duration from a request. Filtered by route, method, status and instance

targets.expr: 1000 * avg(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_sum{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"} / sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$instance", tenant_name=~"$tenant"})

panels.title: Total Avg Request Time Duration [ms]

panels.description: Average rate successful query per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Successful Query Rate [5m]

panels.description: Average successful query duration in a 5 min interval aggregate by instances. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Avg Successful Query Duration [5m]

panels.description: Average rate failure query per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Failure Query Rate [5m]

panels.description: Average failure query duration in a 5 min interval aggregate by instances. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Avg Failure Query Duration [5m]

panels.title: Current Idle Connections

panels.title: Current In-Use Connections

panels.title: Max Open Connections

panels.description: Percentage utilization of connection pool (total connections / max connections)
panels.title: Pool Utilization %

panels.description: Active vs idle database connections over time by pool
panels.title: Active vs Idle Connections Over Time

panels.description: Total connection distribution across database pools
panels.title: Connection Distribution by Pool

panels.description: Rate of connections closed due to various limits over time
panels.title: Connection Closure Rate [5m]

panels.description: Connection wait events and duration metrics
panels.title: Connection Wait Metrics [5m]

panels.description: Total lifetime connection closures per pool
panels.title: Total Connection Closures

panels.description: Query success rate percentage across all query types
panels.title: Query Success Rate

panels.description: Enhanced query rate metrics with instance filtering
panels.title: Enhanced Query Rate by Instance [5m]

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, endpoint, method) (rate(sdp_circle_circle_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket[1m]) or vector(0)) )

panels.title: Circle API - 95th Percentile Request Duration by Endpoint and Method
Circle API - Average Request Duration by Method and Endpoint
Circle API - Histogram of Request Durations
